questions.text: Audie Murphy gained fame as a what in the forties?
Whom did Truman name Chief Justice of the United States in the forties?
Mussolini committed suicide just before V-E Day?
questions.explanation:
False.

	He was executed by anti-Fascist guerrillas while he was trying to flee to Switzerland.

questions.text: In what city was the treaty creating the axis alliance between Germany, Italy and Japan signed?
questions.explanation:
Berlin.

	There was also another treaty between Rome and Berlin, signed in Rome.

questions.text: Who wrote the war inspired song 'Praise the Lord and Pass the Ammunition'?

Eleanor Roosevelt was an opponent of birth control?
What was television's first western series?
